sentences: Aafrika toidud ei vasta eurooplaste maitsele.
Tal on hea kirjanduslik, muusikaline maitse.
context: The Estonian word 'maitse' has three main meanings: 1) The property of dissolved substances that causes the sensation of taste (sweet, sour, salty, bitter tastes); 2) An individually developed feeling about what is tasteful or appealing regarding food; 3) A collection of aesthetic value judgments and corresponding understandings of beauty. It can refer to flavors in foods, personal preferences for certain tastes/styles, or broader aesthetic sensibilities.
